tvshow.title: WandaVision
tvshow.description: Blends the style of classic sitcoms with the MCU, in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision - two super-powered beings living their ideal suburban lives - begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

tvshow.title: The Falcon And The Winter Soldier
tvshow.description: Following the events of 'Avengers: Endgame,' Sam Wilson/Falcon and Bucky Barnes/Winter Soldier team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities -- and their patience.

tvshow.title: Loki
tvshow.description: A new Marvel chapter with Loki at its center.

tvshow.title: Shang-Chi
tvshow.description: The movie, based on Marvel Comics, will focus on Shang-Chi; 'The Master of Kung-Fu'.

tvshow.title: Hawkeye
tvshow.description: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.

tvshow.title: Eternals
tvshow.description: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

tvshow.title: Armor Wars
tvshow.description: Find out in this series what would happen if Tony Stark's tech fell into the wrong hands.

tvshow.title: Moon Knight
tvshow.description: Marc Spector is a former CIA agent whose life is saved by the Moon God, Khonshu.

tvshow.title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
tvshow.description: The missions of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.
